attributes.action: Ban the grand national it’s unfair to the horses
attributes.additional_details:
Continued from above- put u down cause you weren’t good enough
40 horse have died between 2000-2013 that’s ridiculous
attributes.background: I’m disgusted with the amount of horses being killed in the grand national is unbelievable and really unfair I use to work with horses and they are animals the don’t deserve to be treated this way and I thinks it’s time the horses had someone on their side how would u feel if they put u down
